text:
Our chimes go off at 9 oâ€™clock 
every day,

9 a.m. and 9 p.m. to commemorate
the Emanuel nine.

So I think a lot of times 
people will look

and begin to say well surely
maybe after year two

they should be fine, year three 
they should be fine.
It's going to take some time.

Early on even when I was
assigned here,

several people wanted
to remodel down here

to just kind of change
the scenery so to speak.

When you begin to think about
mass casualty,

when you begin to think about
murdering

taking place in a sacred place,
I think in actuality

what happens is each day
you find new strength.
